name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos - Season Pass
name_original: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos - Season Pass
description:
Turn your Dungeon of Naheulbeuk experience into an even wackier RPG adventure with the Season Pass. The Season Pass includes 3 DLC adding more story, tactical fights and humor.

DLC 1: Ruins of Limis
Everyone’s favourite unlikely heroes are back, and this time they’re caught in a conflict between a coven of Vampires and a band of Necromancers. Grab your sword, pick a side, and do your best to survive the night your brains un-eaten.

Features:
  • Step back into the hilarious fantasy parody world, based on the iconic audio series by French author John Lang.
  • A vast haunted environment to explore.
  • A spooky main questline with two factions and alternate routes: choose your side, between the Necromancers and the Vampires!
  • Additional sidequests, including a ‘Frankentroll’ storyline where the heroes must hunt down different troll body parts to combine into a sublime ogrish being.
  • New battle mechanics to diversify your experience
  • Eleven brand new boss fights and an expanded cast. 
  • Chickens!

DLC2 / DLC3: More information coming soon!
